languages.text: Впрочем, крепкая дружба с династией фон Валанциус не помешала пиратским эскадрам поучаствовать в разграблении сокровищ протектората, когда флоты возмущенных соседей явились, чтобы свершить возмездие.
However, close friendship with the von Valancius dynasty did not stop pirate squadrons from pillaging the protectorate's treasures when fleets of outraged neighbours arrived to take their vengeance.
languages.original_text: Впрочем, крепкая дружба с династией фон Валанциус не помешала пиратским эскадрам поучаствовать в разграблении сокровищ протектората, когда флоты возмущенных соседей явились, чтобы свершить возмездие.

traits.locale_text: Though, close friendship with the von Valancius dynasty did not stop pirate squadrons from participating in pillaging the treasures of the protectorate, when fleets of outraged neighbours arrived to take their vengeance.

Though, close friendship with the von Valancius dynasty did not stop pirate squadrons from participating in pillaging the treasures of the protectorate, when fleets of outraged neighbours arrived to take their vengeance.
However, close friendship with the von Valancius dynasty did not stop pirate squadrons from pillaging the protectorate's treasures when fleets of outraged neighbours arrived to take their vengeance.
However, close friendship with the von Valancius dynasty did not stop pirate squadrons from pillaging the protectorate's treasures when fleets of outraged neighbours arrived to take their vengeance.
However, close friendship with the von Valancius dynasty did not stop pirate squadrons from pillaging the protectorate's treasures when fleets of outraged neighbours arrived to take their vengeance.
However, close friendship with the von Valancius dynasty did not stop pirate squadrons from pillaging the protectorate's treasures when fleets of outraged neighbours arrived to take their vengeance.

languages.text: 尽管如此，当愤怒的邻国舰队前来报复时，众多海盗依旧将目光投向了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的财富。即便是他们之间的亲密友谊，也无法阻止海盗舰队对王朝进行劫掠。
languages.original_text: However, close friendship with the von Valancius dynasty did not stop pirate squadrons from pillaging the protectorate's treasures when fleets of outraged neighbours arrived to take their vengeance.

traits.locale_text: 尽管如此，当愤怒的邻国舰队前来报复时，众多海盗依旧将目光投向了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的财富。即便是他们之间的亲密友谊，也无法阻止海盗舰队对王朝进行劫掠。

languages.text: Aber die enge Freundschaft mit der Dynastie derer von Valancius hielt die Piratengeschwader nicht davon ab, die Schätze des Protektorats zu plündern, als Flotten zorniger Nachbarn eintrafen, um Rache zu nehmen.
languages.original_text: However, close friendship with the von Valancius dynasty did not stop pirate squadrons from pillaging the protectorate's treasures when fleets of outraged neighbours arrived to take their vengeance.

traits.locale_text: Aber die enge Freundschaft mit der Dynastie derer von Valancius hielt die Piratengeschwader nicht davon ab, die Schätze des Protektorats zu plündern, als Flotten zorniger Nachbarn eintrafen, um Rache zu nehmen.

languages.text: Toutefois, l'amitié étroite qu'elle avait nouée avec la dynastie von Valancius ne suffit pas à la protéger des escouades pirates venues piller les trésors du protectorat lorsque des flottes entières de voisins indignés débarquèrent pour exercer leur vengeance.
languages.original_text: However, close friendship with the von Valancius dynasty did not stop pirate squadrons from pillaging the protectorate's treasures when fleets of outraged neighbours arrived to take their vengeance.

traits.locale_text: Toutefois, l'amitié étroite qu'elle avait nouée avec la dynastie von Valancius ne suffit pas à la protéger des escouades pirates venues piller les trésors du protectorat lorsque des flottes entières de voisins indignés débarquèrent pour exercer leur vengeance.

languages.text: Sin embargo, su amistad con la dinastía von Valancius no impidió a los escuadrones piratas saquear los tesoros del protectorado cuando flotas de vecinos furiosos llegaron en busca de venganza.
languages.original_text: However, close friendship with the von Valancius dynasty did not stop pirate squadrons from pillaging the protectorate's treasures when fleets of outraged neighbours arrived to take their vengeance.

traits.locale_text: Sin embargo, su amistad con la dinastía von Valancius no impidió a los escuadrones piratas saquear los tesoros del protectorado cuando flotas de vecinos furiosos llegaron en busca de venganza.

languages.text: ただし、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝との緊密な関係性は、怒りに燃える周辺領の艦隊が復讐に赴いたときでさえ、海賊部隊による保護領への財宝の略奪をやめさせることはなかった。
languages.original_text: However, close friendship with the von Valancius dynasty did not stop pirate squadrons from pillaging the protectorate's treasures when fleets of outraged neighbours arrived to take their vengeance.

traits.locale_text: ただし、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝との緊密な関係性は、怒りに燃える周辺領の艦隊が復讐に赴いたときでさえ、海賊部隊による保護領への財宝の略奪をやめさせることはなかった。

languages.text: Ancak von Valancius hanedanlığıyla yakın dostlukları, öfkeli komşularının filoları intikam almaya geldiğinde korsan eskadralarının protektora hazinelerini yağmalamasına engel olmadı.
languages.original_text: However, close friendship with the von Valancius dynasty did not stop pirate squadrons from pillaging the protectorate's treasures when fleets of outraged neighbours arrived to take their vengeance.

traits.locale_text: Ancak von Valancius hanedanlığıyla yakın dost olmaları, öfkeli komşularının filoları intikam almaya geldiğinde, korsan eskadralarının protektoranın hazinelerini yağmalamasının önüne geçmedi.
